long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
iC2 password is a feature that automatically fills the username and password for a website or application when a user click launch button from icomply2app platform(password management page).When a user click launch their credentials for a website or application, the chrome extension will auto fill the login form from the iComply2app database. Once the user refresh the page, the credentials will be removed/deleted. The users should click launch button from iComply2app to auto fill the credentials in a website or application. 

This feature is designed to save time and simplify the login process for users. Instead of having to remember and type in complex passwords every time, users can rely on their password manager or browser to automatically fill in the login credentials for them.
